item.title: Shraddha Kapoor confirms relationship with Rahul Mody? Rumoured love birds twin in matching outfits in cute pic - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Shraddha Kapoor Confirms Relationship with Rahul Mody

Date: Jan 17, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Shraddha Kapoor is making headlines for sharing a cute matching outfits picture with her rumored boyfriend, Rahul Mody, on Instagram, further fueling their relationship rumors.

  • Shraddha Kapoor shared a photo with Rahul Mody in matching night dresses on Instagram.
  • They were seen twinning, although only their lower bodies were visible.
  • Shraddha previously shared a picture enjoying a vada pav date with Rahul, putting split rumors to rest.
  • The couple was recently spotted together in Mumbai after a dinner date.
  • Shraddha has a successful film, Stree 2, and is set to star in Nagin.
“May I always bully you into taking me for vada pav,” said Shraddha Kapoor in her social media post.

This adorable post has only added to the excitement surrounding Shraddha Kapoor's personal life and upcoming projects.

item.title: Emergency box office collection Day 1 early estimates: Kangana Ranaut starrer off to a slow start - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Kangana Ranaut's Latest Film Faces a Slow Start at the Box Office

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Times of India

The much-anticipated film starring Kangana Ranaut has received disappointing early estimates in its first day of box office collection.

  • The film struggled to attract audiences despite high expectations.
  • Early estimates indicate a significantly lower collection compared to previous releases.
  • The reasons for the slow start could involve competition from other films and mixed reviews.
"The audience response has not met the film's anticipations, reflecting a challenging market for new releases."

In conclusion, the film's slow start raises concerns about its potential success and future box office prospects.

item.title: Actor Saif Ali Khan stabbed inside Bandra house: Here are 5 unanswered questions - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Actor Saif Ali Khan stabbed: CCTV camera footage showed the suspected attacker scurrying down the stairs from the sixth floor of the Satguru Sharan building.

Date: Jan 17, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan was attacked and stabbed multiple times in his Bandra apartment. He underwent emergency surgery and is now reported out of danger.

  • Saif Ali Khan suffered six stab wounds, including one to his neck.
  • The incident occurred around 2:30 AM when Khan was at home with his family.
  • He was attacked by an intruder demanding a ransom of ₹1 crore but did not break into the flat.
  • The suspected attacker escaped via the stairs and is still at large.
  • Questions arise regarding security and potential insider involvement.
“Several questions remain unanswered, raising concerns about the security breach in one of Mumbai's most secure residential areas.”

This incident highlights significant security issues in the local community and calls for improvements to ensure the safety of residents.

item.title: Saif Ali Khan Attacked News Updates: "Still Trying To Process...": Kareena Kapoor After Attack On Saif Ali Khan - NDTV
item.description:
Kareena Kapoor Responds to Saif Ali Khan's Knife Attack

Publication Date: January 16, 2025

Source: NDTV

The attack on Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan has left both friends and family in a state of shock. Kareena Kapoor Khan shared her struggles in processing the day’s traumatic events.

  • Saif Ali Khan was attacked at his residence in Mumbai, suffering six stab wounds.
  • He underwent a five-hour surgery and is reported to be out of danger.
  • Family and friends have rushed to his side at the hospital, expressing their support on social media.
  • Maharashtra Minister Ashish Shelar emphasized the need for ensuring the family's recovery from this trauma.
  • Police investigations are ongoing, with multiple teams set to apprehend the attacker.
  • Concerns over safety in Mumbai have been raised by various political figures following the incident.
“We are still trying to process the events that have unfolded.” — Kareena Kapoor

This incident not only highlights the increasing concern regarding celebrity safety but reflects broader issues of law and order in Mumbai.

item.title: Here is the list of OTT movies and series releasing this week - 123telugu
item.description:
Here is the list of OTT movies and series releasing this week

Published on: Jan 17, 2025 12:03 am IST

With the Sankranthi festivities behind us and the theaters having already entertained us, it’s time to shift focus to the exciting movies and series dropping this week. We’ve got the list ready for you, so all you have to do is kick back on your couch, grab some popcorn, and enjoy your favorite shows.

  • Aha: Mokshapatam (Telugu movie) – Jan 14; Minmini (Tamil movie-Telugu dubbed) – Jan 16
  • Netflix: Rifle Club (Malayalam super hit movie) – Jan 16; The Roshans (Hindi docu-series) – Jan 17
  • Sony LIV: Pani (Malayalam movie-Telugu dubbed) – Jan 16

These are the confirmed releases for this week. Stay tuned for any additional titles that may further enrich your viewing experience.

item.title: Saif Ali Khan Attacked News Live Updates: "Still Trying To Process...": Kareena Kapoor After Attack On Saif Ali Khan - NDTV
item.description:
Saif Ali Khan Attacked News Updates: "Still Trying To Process...": Kareena Kapoor After Attack On Saif Ali Khan

Publication Date: January 16, 2025 | Source: NDTV

The news of the attack on Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan has led his family and friends to rush to the hospital, offering support as he undergoes recovery after a surgery resulting from six stab wounds inflicted during an attack at his Mumbai home.

  • Saif underwent a five-hour surgery after the knife attack at his residence.
  • Family and friends, including Kareena Kapoor's cousin, Riddhima Kapoor Sahni, have shown their support through social media.
  • Maharashtra Minister Ashish Shelar visited the hospital and emphasized the need for the family to recover from the traumatic incident.
  • Filmmaker Kunal Kohli expressed concern for Saif's children who witnessed the incident.
  • CCTV footage is being examined by police as investigations continue to track down the attacker.
“It's a very shocking incident, a very sad incident.” - Kunal Kohli

The incident has generated significant public concern about safety in Mumbai, with several political figures commenting on the government's handling of law and order.

item.title: Paatal Lok Season 2 Release Time: Here’s When Jaideep Ahlawat’s Crime Thriller Premiere On Prime Video - Filmibeat
item.description:
Paatal Lok Season 2 Release Time: Here’s When Jaideep Ahlawat’s Crime Thriller Premieres On Prime Video

Published: Thursday, January 16, 2025, 22:51 [IST]

The highly anticipated second season of the crime thriller Paatal Lok, starring Jaideep Ahlawat, will premiere on January 17 on Prime Video, captivating fans with a new gripping case set in Nagaland.

  • Jaideep Ahlawat reprises his role as Inspector Hathiram Chowdhary.
  • Gul Panag returns as Renu Chaudhary.
  • The new season navigates a fresh, intriguing case.
  • Available exclusively on Prime Video for subscribers.
“As fans have been waiting for Paatal Lok Season 2 with a bated breath, the wait is set to be over.”

With the release at midnight on January 17, viewers can look forward to an engaging continuation of the story.

item.title: Coldplay's Chris Martin Greets Paps With Namaste As He Arrives In Mumbai With Dakota Johnson | Watch - News18
item.description:
Chris Martin Greets Paparazzi with Namaste in Mumbai Arrival with Dakota Johnson

Date: January 17, 2025  Source: News18

Coldplay’s frontman Chris Martin has arrived in India for the Music of the Spheres World Tour, creating excitement among fans. He was seen at the Mumbai airport with Dakota Johnson and greeted the paparazzi with a respectful ‘namaste’.

  • Chris Martin and Dakota Johnson arrived at Mumbai airport for Coldplay's concert tour.
  • Chris's gesture of ‘namaste’ received a positive public reaction.
  • Coldplay will perform three concerts in Mumbai on January 18, 19, and 21.
  • A notice has been issued regarding child safety at their Ahmedabad concert later in January.
  • The notice emphasizes the need for ear protection for children attending the concerts.
“I am committed to ensuring that children’s rights and health are protected. Such steps will continue to safeguard them from harmful exposure.” - Pandit Rao Dharnevar

Chris Martin’s arrival and gesture have set the tone for much-anticipated concerts, while health and safety concerns for children remain a priority for organizers.

item.title: Kareena Kapoor breaks silence on attack on Saif Ali Khan: ‘Kindly respect our boundaries and give us space’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Kareena Kapoor speaks out after attack on Saif Ali Khan: 'Respect our boundaries'

Date: January 16, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

Kareena Kapoor has expressed her feelings regarding the recent attack on her husband Saif Ali Khan, who was stabbed during a burglary attempt at their home in Mumbai. She called for respect for their privacy during this difficult time.

  • Kareena responded to the attack on Saif, asking for boundaries and peace for her family.
  • She described the day as incredibly challenging and requested an end to relentless media scrutiny and speculation.
  • After her statement, several celebrities from the film industry showed their support, including Arjun Kapoor and Sonam Kapoor.
“It has been an incredibly challenging day for our family, and we are still trying to process the events that have unfolded,” Kareena stated.

The incident occurred early Thursday morning, and despite the serious nature of the attack, Saif is now stable after undergoing emergency surgery.

item.title: Vidaamuyarchi’s release date and trailer out now - 123telugu
item.description:
Vidaamuyarchi’s Release Date and Trailer Out Now

Published on: Jan 16, 2025 8:00 pm IST

As promised, the makers of Ajith’s Vidaamuyarchi dropped the theatrical trailer online, and it looks stylish, featuring impressive action sequences and an interesting plot about the protagonist’s struggle for his lady love, who gets kidnapped on a road trip.

  • The movie is set to release on February 6, 2025, in Tamil and Telugu.
  • In Telugu, the film will be released under the name Pattudala.
  • Trisha stars as the leading lady in the film.
  • The cast includes Arjun Sarja, Regina Cassandra, Aarav, among others.
  • The film is produced by Subaskaran under the banner of Lyca Productions.
  • Anirudh Ravichander is composing the soundtrack.
“The trailer has set the right expectations.”

Initially planned for a Pongal 2025 release, the film is now positioned for a February debut.

item.title: 'Attacker entered son Jeh's room, demanded Rs 1 cr': Saif Ali Khan's staff shares shocking details - The Times of India
item.description:
Attacker entered son Jeh's room, demanded Rs 1 cr: Saif Ali Khan's staff shares shocking details

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Times of India

In a disturbing incident, an attacker reportedly entered the room of Saif Ali Khan's son, Jeh, demanding a ransom of Rs 1 crore. The incident has raised serious security concerns.

  • The attacker broke into the private residence of Saif Ali Khan.
  • Demands were made for a significant ransom, aiming to leverage the family’s high profile.
  • Staff members disclosed chilling details about the encounter.
  • The incident has led to heightened security measures for the family.
“This incident has shaken us all. The safety of our children is a priority,” stated a family representative.

This alarming incident underscores the growing concerns regarding celebrity security and the potential risks faced by high-profile families.

item.title: Game Changer Box Office Collections: Ram Charan, Shankar film gross 158cr worldwide in six days - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Game Changer Box Office Collections: Ram Charan, Shankar film gross 158cr worldwide in six days

Publication Date: January 16, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

The Ram Charan starrer has grossed another Rs. 26 crore approx internationally, taking its worldwide gross to over Rs. 150 crore, at Rs. 158 crore.

  • Accumulated Rs. 132 crore at the Indian box office in six days.
  • The film grossed over Rs. 5 crore in the Telugu states in a single day.
  • Six-day collections in the twin states are Rs. 82 crore approx.
  • The film had a strong opening with Rs. 58.50 crore on its first day.
  • Performance in Tamil Nadu was disappointing compared to expectations.

The Day Wise Box Office Collections of Game Changer in India are as follows:

  • Friday: Rs. 58.50 cr.
  • Saturday: Rs. 25.00 cr.
  • Sunday: Rs. 19.50 cr.
  • Monday: Rs. 9.50 cr.
  • Tuesday: Rs. 11.75 cr.
  • Wednesday: Rs. 7.75 cr.
  • Total: Rs. 132.00 cr.

The Territorial Breakdown for Box Office Collections of Game Changer in India is as follows:

  • AP/TS: Rs. 82.50 cr.
  • Nizam: Rs. 29.50 cr.
  • Ceded: Rs. 13.50 cr.
  • Andhra: Rs. 39.50 cr.
  • Karnataka: Rs. 8.50 cr.
  • Tamil Nadu: Rs. 8.00 cr.
  • Kerala: Rs. 0.50 cr.
  • Rest of India: Rs. 32.50 cr.
  • INDIA: Rs. 132.00 cr.

Despite a strong box office performance, the film's collection in Tamil Nadu has been underwhelming, expressing disappointment considering the director Shankar's reputation.

item.title: Daaku Maharaaj joins the elite Rs. 100 crore club in just 4 days - 123telugu
item.description:
Daaku Maharaaj Joins the Elite Rs. 100 Crore Club in Just 4 Days

Published on: Jan 16, 2025 | Source: 123Telugu

Daaku Maharaaj, released on January 12, 2025, has exceeded expectations, becoming one of the biggest hits of the Sankranthi season.

  • Directed by Bobby Kolli, the film has grossed Rs. 105 crore globally in just four days.
  • The film is expected to continue its successful run with upcoming releases of dubbed versions.
  • Features a stellar cast including Balakrishna, Bobby Deol, and Urvashi Rautela.
  • The Tamil version is releasing soon, with speculation about a Hindi dubbed version to follow.
“The film’s momentum shows no signs of slowing down.”

With its strong start, Daaku Maharaaj looks set to maintain its success in cinemas.
